news.title: Justia Legal Resources: Lawyers and the Legal Process Center
news.description: Working with an attorney or launching a lawsuit can be daunting for people unfamiliar with the legal system. The Lawyers and the Legal Process Center sheds some light on what to expect in litigation and its alternatives.

news.title: News and Notes From Google Local Services Ads: February 2024
news.description: It's time again for our latest installment of "News and Notes From Google Local Services Ads," delivering essential updates for lawyers directly from the Google Partner newsletter. Dive into this post to remain informed about the latest changes and adjustments influencing how lawyers utilize Google Local Services to promote their practices.
